articles.title: Ford Settles It: Electric Vehicle Gloom & Doom Was Premature - CleanTechnica
articles.description: Ford claps back at electric vehicle doomscrollers with plans for a new EVs including confirmation of the secret "skunkworks" project.

articles.title: The rise of magnets – from surgery to outer space - BBC.com
articles.description: Magnets are central to much modern technology and firms are racing to make them more efficient.
